trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Poughkeepsie
There were no other sightings in Poughkeepsie on or around September 22nd 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsClear Skies : Facing West, 60 degrees up from level ground. I'm looking toward the Moon, to the Left of the moon, 30 dgrees, 2 Pencils Suddenly appear out of the West Coming FAST. One Following the other on it's left. Doing a Slow Curve to the South, 20 degress. SUDDENLY they BOTH go Nose Up and VANISH ! Then a Third one shows on the SAME path about 5 minutes later. Does the Same manuver. GONE ! I ALWAYS keep my Eyes on the Skies, It Finally Paid off (Again). That was Exciting ! ! ! ! ! Too far away to photograph :o(
